short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly check Time To First Byte (TTFB) for any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üöÄ TTFB Checker is a unique extension designed for swiftly analyzing the TTFB (Time To First Byte) of any webpage you browse. In the realm of web performance metrics, TTFB serves as an indispensable measure, accounting for the duration from a browser request to receiving the first byte from a web server.

üîç With the ability to keep an eye on the Time To First Byte, it provides valuable insights into the page load time, allowing you to pinpoint and address any potential performance issues that might affect the overall user experience and webpage load speed.

üíª Whether you're a developer striving to enhance website performance, or an SEO specialist looking to improve page load metrics, TTFB Checker proves to be an essential tool in your digital toolkit.
